text: Never mind, circled the issue with AWS proxy

Hey Team - New here so please let me know if I should post elsewhere or if someone else has covered this before.  I have a Custom Code workflow to change two letter country codes to the full names and copy it into the Country/Region open text field on the Contact record.  It works most of the time but the other 90% it throws a “Unable to update property” Error.  I can find a pattern or reason as to why.  Has anyone else had this issue? or any ideas on how to fix it?  Happy to share the code/workflow information as necessary.
Best to put this in the workflows channel so that the correct team has visibility over it

Is it possible to have all new pages created on a specific subdomain password gated by default? i.e. set up a `<http://staging.yoursite.com|staging.yoursite.com>` subdomain, so then new pages created under it are automatically gated.
I mean, technically you could setup a cron function to check for new pages every 5 minutes and if there is a new page update the settings and password protect it
Can someone direct me to a source that could help with our website?
What type of help are you looking for?
Thank you Carter. I see what my issue was I did not have oAuth enabled on the authentication call. Now that it is enabled I am able to pass all Unit Tests.
